LanguageData.Apparel_KidHelmet.label: kid helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_KidHelmet.description: A simple helmet sized for children. It gives moderate protection against sharp attacks. Not effective against blunt weapons. That said, if this is being used in combat something has already gone very wrong.
LanguageData.Apparel_KidPants.label: kid pants
LanguageData.Apparel_KidPants.description: A small set of pants sized to fit children.
LanguageData.Apparel_KidParka.label: kid parka
LanguageData.Apparel_KidParka.description: A heavy jacket for keeping a child warm in cold temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_KidRomper.label: kid romper
LanguageData.Apparel_KidRomper.description: A combined t-shirt and pants sized for kids, with a snuggly built-in undergarment. Little ones love it!
LanguageData.Apparel_KidShirt.label: kid shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_KidShirt.description: A small, simple t-shirt sized to fit children.
LanguageData.Apparel_KidTribal.label: kid tribalwear
LanguageData.Apparel_KidTribal.description: A one-piece garment sized for kids, crafted using neolithic tools. It provides effective insulation against the elements.
